title: Bound by Fate
description: `•.,¸¸,.•´¯ 𝕆𝕡𝕒𝕝 ¯`•.,¸¸,.•´Meeting my mate was the best day of my life… That was until he rejected me seconds after giving me the best birthday present a girl could ask for. I had eleven years to recover from the heartache, reinventing myself into omeone who didn’t care. When he steps back in my life, I’m forced right back to where I started. But not for long. Apparently fates a bitch and decided that one man wasn’t enough to handle me, so she gave me two. Either the Goddess thinks I’m extremely high maintenance or she thinks I’m extra deserving. Either way I’m not sure what was going through her mind when she gave me two identical twins. One who rejected me and another who promises me the world. The problem? Our souls will never be complete with one of them left out. How do I trust these men after one already ripped out my heart and stomped on it?Can Zeke redeem himself after his rejection? Can Axel prove to Opal that he’s nothing like his brother? Or did Zeke’s actions doom them all to a life alone?
author: F.D. Fair
